name: Thronebreaker: The Witcher Tales
notes: Download and perform actions as instructed here: https://github.com/z0z0z/mf-install This registers all the dlls needed for video playback.

files.goginstaller: N/A:Select the installer downloaded from GOG

content:
files:
- goginstaller: N/A:Select the installer downloaded from GOG
- mfplat_dll: https://lutris.net/files/tools/dll/mfplat/x64/mfplat.dll
game:
  arch: win64
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Thronebreaker/Thronebreaker.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: mf
    arch: win64
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win64
    cabfile: $HOME/.cache/winetricks/win7sp1/windows6.1-KB976932-X64.exe
    component: mediafoundation
    name: install_cab_component
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win64
    cabfile: $HOME/.cache/winetricks/win7sp1/windows6.1-KB976932-X64.exe
    component: mf_
    name: install_cab_component
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win64
    cabfile: $HOME/.cache/winetricks/win7sp1/windows6.1-KB976932-X64.exe
    component: mfreadwrite
    name: install_cab_component
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win64
    cabfile: $HOME/.cache/winetricks/win7sp1/windows6.1-KB976932-X64.exe
    component: wmadmod
    name: install_cab_component
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win64
    cabfile: $HOME/.cache/winetricks/win7sp1/windows6.1-KB976932-X64.exe
    component: wmvdecod
    name: install_cab_component
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: xact
    arch: win64
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    description: 'Installing Thronebreaker: The Witcher Tales'
    executable: goginstaller
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- move:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Thronebreaker
    src: mfplat_dll
- task:
    app: win7
    arch: win64
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
system:
  env:
    DXVK_HUD: 0
    __GL_SHADER_DISK_CACHE: 1
    __GL_SHADER_DISK_CACHE_PATH: $GAMEDIR
wine:
  dxvk: true
  version: tkg-4.0-x86_64
